```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)
library(GGally)
library(car)
```

## Exploratory Data Analysis

```{r}
baseball_batting <- read_csv("http://www.stat.cmu.edu/cmsac/sure/materials/data/regression_projects/baseball_batting.csv") %>% 
  dplyr::mutate(WPA_net = WPA_plus + WPA_minus)
str(baseball_batting)
```

We add an additional column, `WPA_net`, as the sum of `WPA_plus` and `WPA_minus` to show the net change in win probability per player per season.

```{r}
baseball_batting %>% 
  ggplot(aes(WPA_net)) +
  geom_histogram() +
  labs(x = "",
       y = "")
  theme_bw()
```

```{r}
ggpairs(baseball_batting, columns = c("WPA_plus", "H", "HR", "R", "RBI", "AVG", "SLG"))
```

```{r}
ggpairs(baseball_batting, columns = c("WPA_minus", "SO", "BB_K", "CS", "Strikes"))
```
